educationItems.description: Focusing on advanced computer science topics including artificial intelligence, virtual reality, software engineering, and system design.

thesis.title: Intelligent and Automated Path-Planning with Mixed Reality for Mobile Systems within Hospital Environments

educationItems.description: Comprehensive study of computer science fundamentals, enhanced by specialization in mixed reality and motion planning through my bachelor thesis. Gained insights into practical applications through a minor in mechanical engineering and participation in an AI seminar.
Completed secondary education with focus on mathematics and sciences.
